content: all patterns are written in english in us terms using craft yarn council abbreviations published in a printable pdf format the rick rack pumpkin premium pattern 2 0 is designed to be easy to read whether you are a confident beginner or an expert plushy artist this pattern comes equipped with everything you need to succeed when you are finished with your project you will have learned new and useful skills for your art form and created a beautiful piece to cherish updated premium patterns now include checkboxes to keep you on track and organized color coding when needed and helpful tutorial photos right where you need them and none where you don t confident you can do it without helpful photos or checkboxes this pattern is also available for free in a text-only format not downloadable at www hookedbykati com video tutorial available at https //youtu be/a5eaqdhfw3o https //youtu be/a5eaqdhfw3o you will practice easy techniques how to make a 3-dimensional object in crochet how to shape using increases and decreases supplies red heart super saver yarn 100% acrylic worsted weight 364 yds/7 oz/198 g white wht < 1 ball pumpkin pum < 1 ball g 4 00 mm hook polyfil stuffing wine cork tacky glue or another white glue yarn needle measurements 5 /6 /7 tall x 7 /7 5 /8 in diameter post comments and pictures on instagram with the hashtag #hookedbykati on the facebook page or in the epic amigurumi patterns and crochet quests facebook group you may sell products made by this pattern but please link back to hookedbykati com or credit hooked by kati on the craft fair tag do not copy this pattern for distribution or sale that s not nice and slightly illegal all my patterns come with unlimited help from me if you run into a snag drop me a line i respond quickly and will help any way i can to clarify any confusion or challenging stitches
